Class GUIFacePanel.GUINoteListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
      • GUIFacePanel.GUINoteListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    KeyListener, MouseListener, MouseMotionListener, MouseWheelListener, EventListener
    Enclosing class:
    GUIFacePanel

    protected class GUIFacePanel.GUINoteListener
extends MouseAdapter
implements KeyListener
    Class for listening to the side panel to activate interactions with individual channels

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected boolean binding
      Holds the information about whether binding mode is enabled or not
      protected int groupID
      Holds the information on the groupID currently set in the listener
      private KeyPosition lastKey
      Holds the last KeyPosition stored in the listener
      private int lastKeyCode
      Holds the information on the last KeyCode to be pressed for binding
      private int NOACTION
      Used to determine if a key is being rebound
      private int[] pCoord
      Holds the initial coordinates of when the mouse was pressed
      private int[] rCoord
      Holds the initial coordinates of when the mouse was released
      private int REBIND
      Used to determine if rebinding a key
      private int REGROUP
      Used to determine if regrouping a key
      private int REVALUE
      Used to determine if reassigning value played by a key

      • handleFinding

        private KeyPosition handleFinding(int x,
                                  int y)
        Handles finding of a given KeyPosition based on the X and Y parameters
        Parameters:
        x - X coordinate
        y - Y coordinate
        Returns:
        The found KeyPosition if found, otherwise returns a null representing no found KeyPosition

      • handleBinding

        private boolean handleBinding(MouseEvent e)
        Handles the switching of a KeyPosition when clicking in binding mode
        Parameters:
        e - MouseEvent being handled to accomplish this
        Returns:
        True if the KeyPosition was successfully switched

      • toggleBinding

        private void toggleBinding()
        Toggles binding mode on or off

      • handleGrouping

        private void handleGrouping(MouseEvent e)
        Handles the grouping of KeyPositions when clicking in non-binding mode
        Parameters:
        e - MouseEvent being handled to accomplish this

      • handleNextKey

        private KeyPosition handleNextKey(KeyPosition current,
                                  int type,
                                  int newVal)
        Handles interactions with KeyPositions and actions altering their state within the SynthListener
        Parameters:
        current - The current KeyPosition that is being altered
        type - The type of action being performed on the KeyPosition
        newVal - The new value being passsed to the given KeyPosition
        Returns:
        The next KeyPosition on the KeyPositionList. If a bad action was received, the current KeyPosition will be returned and no action will take place.

        Parameters:
